PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Crafting Aura Guy YES i am over capped on block cuz of reduced block mod.
Helm: Fracture 10% mana reservation on a Lich's Circlet. Spam Dense fossils til good energy shield. You can use Augs if you get t1 % and t1 flat. Use eldritch currency for for Int. Craft suppression Chest: Fracture 10% mana reservation on a Twilight Regalia. Spam Dense fossils til good energy shield. You can use Augs if you get t1 % and t1 flat. Use eldritch currency for for Int. Craft suppression Ring: Get manifold ring. Spam Spite(int) untl t1 ES , try to get mana also with slams and annuls. Then use crusader exalt with 2 open prefixes to try to hit energy shield. Craft - mana cost
Merc: Significant updates have been applied to the merc since last update: We now know they have really high increased damage so stuff like rathpith, malachais does not really affect their damage. They also have really high crit multiplier so if you use Maligaros you are losing 2/3s of your damage. We also want to get reflect immune which is important for running risk and we also need to get over 120% so you dont die to vuln and other sources of increased damage. The ring and the chest implicit is what makes this possible. We also swapped the shield slot for acc, attack speed and more fire res along with minimum frenzys. Headhunter was added into the build, one out of like 20 maps the AI will freak out just leave the map and come back.
The most important stat on watchers is crit reduction and suppression
You can also use another elegant hubris slot like the previous version of the build since you have an open jewel socket.
Crafting: Wand: Fracture Fire flat damage ( using essence is cheaper) . Use loathing (crit) or zeal ( attack speed) until you get the other mod with open suffix. Use suffix cannot change and reforge crit for global crit multiplier. Use wild bristle matron for suffix cannot change and use veiled exalt. Craft increased physical damage to unveil Penetration. Craft spell damage.
Helm: Get fractured Life Helm(str dex) Spam any elemental res essence (you can swap later) til T1 accuraccy with open suffix. Use suffix cannot change and reforge chaos for chaos res. Use wild bristle matron and use veiled chaos until you can unveil pierce or aoe. Craft the other.
Shield: Spam any elemental res essence til t1 accuraccy with open suffix. Use suffix cannot change and reforge speed for attack speed. Use wild bristle matron and reforge life til t1 life. Block flat and attempt to slam good mods. Craft fire as extra chaos. I know my shield looks different, it just came out like that.
Gloves: Get Fire resistance fracture and spam Angusish essence til Life. If you have an open prefix you can fill 2 suffix with eldritch currency use prefix cannot change and Aug life for guaranteed extra life or you can just get whatever mod doesnt really matter. Use prefixes cannot change and reforge speed. Craft any hybrid fire res.
Ring: Get Cogwork ring. Fracture essence reflect mod(insanity) Spam multi essence til andy high elemental resistance( you can change later) with open suffix. Lock your suffixes and used veiled chaos to try to land a suffix. Try to unveil any charges. Endurance will make your guy tankier, Frenzy is good lets you change your chest implicit to something else, if you get power you can replace your boots. All 3 charges are good. Use wild bristle matron and Aug life for decent life and craft elemental damage with attack skills or fire damage to attacks both of them really dont do anything i dont think.
